member.name: M:SellingWS.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.param: COMClave=Clave de la Compania, SUCClave = Clave de la Sucursal,ALMClave = Clave del Almacen,origenUBCClave = Clave Ubicacion origen, destinoUBCClave = Clave Ubicacion destino, PROClave = Clave del Producto, cantidad = Cantidad a reubicar

members.member:
Mueve un producto, de una UbicacionTransito a UbicacionAlmacenaje
Clave de la Compania. Clave de la Sucursal. Clave del Almacén. Clave de la ubicacion de Tránsito. Clave de la ubicacion de Almacenaje. Clave del producto.> Cantidad de producto.>

member.name: M:SellingWS.Security.HashPass.CreateHash(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a salted PBKDF2 hash of the password.

member.name: M:SellingWS.Security.HashPass.ValidatePassword(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates a password given a hash of the correct one.
member.param: A hash of the correct password.
member.returns: True if the password is correct. False otherwise.

member.name: M:SellingWS.Security.HashPass.SlowEquals(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compares two byte arrays in length-constant time. This comparison method is used so that password hashes cannot be extracted from on-line systems using a timing attack and then attacked off-line.
member.returns: True if both byte arrays are equal. False otherwise.

member.name: M:SellingWS.Security.HashPass.Pbkdf2(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Computes the PBKDF2-SHA1 hash of a password.
member.param: The length of the hash to generate, in bytes.
